snippet: The Japanese company’s sales rose 12 percent, a year after production slowed when the earthquake and tsunami hit Japan.
abstract: Toyota makes big comeback after two years of struggles, helping the auto industry post its best April results in four years; Toyota's sales in the American market increased 12 percent in April, and its market share climbed to 15 percent, the highest point in 17 months; industry sales rose 2 percent over all. Photos, Charts (M)
lead_paragraph: DETROIT -- Toyota made a big comeback last month after two years of struggles in the United States, helping the auto industry post its best April results in four years, new figures showed on Tuesday. Toyota's sales in the American market increased 12 percent in April, and its market share climbed to 15 percent, the highest point in 17 months.

headline.main: Toyota Back in the Game, Auto Sales Are the Best in 4 Years
